original_text: I was living in peace, but then God destroyed me. He took hold of my neck and he shook me to pieces. He decided to shoot his arrows at me. I was living in peace,
korean_text: 내가 평안하더니 그가 나를 꺾으시며 내 목을 잡아 나를 부숴뜨리시며 나를 세워 과녁을 삼으시고

sentences.original_text: He took hold of my neck
and he shook me to pieces
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 나를 산산조각 내도록 흔들었다

sentences.original_text: He decided to shoot his arrows at me
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나에게 그의 화살을 쏘기로 결정했다
